import React, { useState } from 'react' const SignupForm = () => { const[showPassword,setShowPassword]=useState(false); const[formData,setFormData]=useState({firstName:"",lastName:"",email:"",password:""}) function changeHandler(e){ setFormData((prevData)=>({ ...prevData, [e.target.name]:e.target.value })) } return (
) } export default SignupForm
